Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1969...
Injured on 8/27/1969 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/14/1972 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/29/1973...
Had first career hit on 7/12/1974, off Douglas Rayo (Mal)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1975, going 3-1, 0.58...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1976, winning 2 games with a 1.20 ERA...
Injured on 5/29/1976 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/20/1978, off Justin Bostic (NE)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1982, going 3-0, 0.64...
Injured on 8/7/1984 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
